37.eng-name: The Book of Fighting [The Prohibition of Bloodshed]

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Zaid bin Thabit said:"This Verse - 'And whoever kills a believer intentionally, his recompense is Hell' - was revealed six months after the Verse which was revealed in Surat Al-Furqan

chapter.eng-name: The Gravity of the Sin of Shedding Blood
